mapper.select: Select rownum rn, b.* FROM (SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (select o.user_id, o.order_date, o.order_id, o.payment, o.order_state, c.book from(select listagg(a.names, ',')within group(order by a.names) AS book, o.order_id from (select h.order_id, b.book_name + h.history_count names ,b.isbn from historys h JOIN books b ON (h.isbn=b.isbn)) a JOIN orders o ON(a.order_id=o.order_id) group by o.order_id) c join orders o ON( c.order_id=o.order_id) WHERE user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY 2 DESC) a WHERE rownum <= #{page}*10) b WHERE b.rn > (#{page}-1)*10

select o.*,c.book ,c.num, c.book_price FROM (select h.order_id, b.book_name book ,h.history_count num ,b.book_price,b.isbn from historys h JOIN books b ON (h.isbn=b.isbn))c join orders o ON(o.order_id=c.order_id) WHERE order_id=#{orderId}
